hiw.title: How It Works
hiw.p1description: In the main menu of your account, go to the "Competitions" section, click "Create", and fill in the required fields.
hiw.p2description: After creating a competition, add at least one stage.
hiw.p4description: Add the email address of the person responsible for timing at the finish line.
hiw.p5description:
On the stage page, click "Start". Tap the participant's number to begin the timer.
The person at the finish line will have access to the competition in the "Timing" section. The started participant's number will appear — clicking it will stop the timer.
hiw.p6description: All results are automatically saved in the participants' table for each stage.

welcome.title: Smart Timing for MTB, Enduro, or Any Race with Individual Starts
welcome.description: Run local downhill, enduro, or similar time-trial events using just smartphones. Start and stop timers remotely, manage participants, and get instant results — no expensive equipment needed.
